metadata.title: CVE-2022-25375 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in drivers/usb/gadget/function/rndis.c in the Linuxkernel before 5.16.10. The RNDIS USB gadget lacks validation of the size ofthe RNDIS_MSG_SET command. Attackers can obtain sensitive information fromkernel memory.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
